contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name= Zabzugu-Tatale District |settlement_type=[[District]] |native_name = |nickname = |image_skyline = |image_size = |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_map = Northern Ghana districts.png |map_caption = Districts of Northern region |pushpin_map=Ghana |pushpin_map_caption = Zabzugu-Tatale District in [[Northern Region, Ghana|Northern region]] |coordinates_region = GH |subdivision_type = |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1= Region |subdivision_name1=[[Northern Region, Ghana|Northern Region]] |subdivision_type2= Capital |subdivision_name2= [[Zabzugu]] |leader_title =District executive |leader_name = Alhaji Yakubu Bukari |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 2365 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |population_as_of = 2013 |population_note = |population_total = â€” |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = |timezone = [[Greenwich Mean Time]] |utc_offset = +0 |timezone_DST = [[Greenwich Mean Time|GMT]] |utc_offset_DST = |latd= 9 |latm=17 |lats= |latNS=N |longd=0 |longm=22 |longs= |longEW=E |elevation_m = |iso_code = [[ISO 3166|GH-NP-ZT]] |blank_name = |blank_info = |website = |footnotes = }} The '''Zabzugu-Tatale District''' is one of the twenty (20) [[District|districts]] in the [[Northern Region, Ghana|Northern Region]] of north [[Ghana]].<ref>[http://zabzugutatale.ghanadistricts.gov.gh/ Zabzugu-Tatale district]</ref> The capital is [[Zabzugu]]. ==Sources== {{reflist}} * {{statoids|id=ygh|title=Districts of Ghana}} * [http://www.ghanadistricts.com/index.asp GhanaDistricts.com] {{Northern Region, Ghana}} {{coord|9.297|N|0.369|E|type:adm2nd_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts of the Northern Region (Ghana)]]
